name: Missile Getaway
description:
This is my first ever game so it will probably be very bad. However this project was a huge learning curve and it would be really helpful if you would donate to support further projects. I hope you will enjoy ;)

----CONTROLS----

left and right arrows or a and d keys for movement.

----ABOUT THE GAME----

The aim of the game is to survive as long as you can. Dodge the missiles and try not to die!
